summary: Mission v9.4.9 - Ultra-Minimal Reels Interface - ALL FEATURES VERIFIED. PartnersCarousel refactored with no counter, no vertical indicators, no title. Like button collé to profile photo. Bio 2 lines max. 'Retour au Flux' button with --primary-color in CoachVitrine.
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ PartnersCarousel.js v9.4.9: NO vertical indicators on right side (removed)
✅ PartnersCarousel.js v9.4.9: NO title above the flux (removed)
✅ Deep black background #000000 on partners section
✅ Like button (HeartIcon) COLLÉ to profile photo (8px gap)
✅ Vertical scroll snap: snap-y snap-mandatory overflow-y-auto
✅ CoachVitrine.js: 'Retour au Flux' button when came from flux
✅ Navigation: Click on video/overlay redirects to /coach/{username}
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mission v9.4.9 fully verified. Key features: (1) PartnersCarousel is now ultra-minimal with NO counter, NO vertical indicators, NO title above flux. (2) Like button is COLLÉ (attached) to profile photo with only 8px gap. (3) Bio zone uses 2-line clamp. (4) Deep black #000000 background. (5) Click navigates to /coach/{username}. (6) CoachVitrine has 'Retour au Flux' button when user comes from flux (uses sessionStorage). (7) Back button uses --primary-color. (8) Fallback video is YouTube GRoUFFQr3uc. Anti-regression: March dates intact, Bassi vitrine has 3 offers, 'Réserver mon cours' button works.

NO_COUNTER_N5.verified_by: Playwright - no text matching /\d+\s*\/\s*\d+/ in partners section

NO_VERTICAL_INDICATORS.description: Vertical indicators on right side removed
NO_VERTICAL_INDICATORS.verified_by: Playwright - no small indicator dots found

NO_TITLE_ABOVE_FLUX.description: No h1/h2/h3 title above partners section
NO_TITLE_ABOVE_FLUX.verified_by: Playwright - no heading elements found before section

16_9_ASPECT_RATIO.verified_by: Playwright - aspectRatio property found on video containers

LIKE_BUTTON_COLLE.description: Like button is attached (collé) to profile photo
LIKE_BUTTON_COLLE.verified_by: Playwright - horizontal gap between photo and like button is 8px

VERTICAL_SCROLL_SNAP.verified_by: Playwright - computed style matches Reels-style vertical snap

CLICK_NAVIGATION_VITRINE.verified_by: Playwright - clicked profile overlay and URL changed to /coach/contact.artboost@gmail.com

RETOUR_AU_FLUX_BUTTON.verified_by: Playwright - button text and style verified after navigation from flux

FALLBACK_VIDEO.verified_by: Code review - DEFAULT_VIDEO_URL constant in PartnersCarousel.js

MARCH_DATES_INTACT.description: All dates are in March, not modified
